name: Stephen M. MAGARO, Appellant, v. Lynn ROBINSON

judges: Before NIX, C.J., and LARSEN, FLAHERTY, McDERMOTT, ZAPPALA and PAPADAKOS and CAPPY, JJ.
LARSEN, J., did not participate in the consideration or decision of this case.
parties: Stephen M. MAGARO, Appellant, v. Lynn ROBINSON.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM:
Appeal dismissed as having been improvidently granted.
LARSEN, J., did not participate in the consideration or decision of this case.
ZAPPALA, J., dissents.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

attorneys: Richard C. Angino, Michael E. Kosik, Harrisburg, for appellant.
Richard B. Wickersham, Harrisburg, for appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
607 A.2d 1074
Stephen M. MAGARO, Appellant, v. Lynn ROBINSON.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Argued May 5, 1992.
Decided June 11, 1992.
Richard C. Angino, Michael E. Kosik, Harrisburg, for appellant.
Richard B. Wickersham, Harrisburg, for appellee.
Before NIX, C.J., and LARSEN, FLAHERTY, McDERMOTT, ZAPPALA and PAPADAKOS and CAPPY, JJ.
